channel.title: Chicken on Cooking
channel.description: Recent content in Chicken on Cooking

item.title: Chicken
item.description: Chicken at 158 for 2 hours Came out extremely tender and juicy. Used for lunches throughout the week. Therefore, I didn’t seare it; I took it out and submerged in an ice bath following by the fridge. Might try 149 degrees that a lot of sites suggest for even more tender results. Picture 1
